Token.Abstract: The delegate of an RKOAuthClient object must adopt the RKOAuthClientDelegate protocol. The protocol defines all methods relating to obtaining an accessToken and handling any errors along the way. It optionally provides callbacks for many different OAuth2 exceptions that may occur during the authorization code flow.
Sent when a new access token has been acquired

Parameter.Name: client
Parameter.Abstract: A reference to the RKOAuthClient that triggered the callback

Parameter.Name: token
Parameter.Abstract: A string of the access token acquired from the authentication server.

Token.Abstract: Sent when an access token request has failed due an invalid authorization code

Parameter.Name: client
Parameter.Abstract: A reference to the RKOAuthClient that triggered the callback

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: An NSError object containing the RKOAuthClientError that triggered the callback

Token.Abstract: Sent to the delegate when the OAuth client encounters any error.

Parameter.Name: client
Parameter.Abstract: A reference to the RKOAuthClient that triggered the callback

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: An NSError object containing the RKOAuthClientError that triggered the callback

Token.Abstract: Sent when the client isn't authorized to perform the requested action

Parameter.Name: client
Parameter.Abstract: A reference to the RKOAuthClient that triggered the callback

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: An NSError object containing the RKOAuthClientError that triggered the callback

Token.Abstract: Sent when an error is encountered with the OAuth client such as an unknown client, there is no client authentication included, or an unsupported authentication method was used.

Parameter.Name: client
Parameter.Abstract: A reference to the RKOAuthClient that triggered the callback

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: An NSError object containing the RKOAuthClientError that triggered the callback

Token.Abstract: Sent when the request sent to the authentication server is invalid

Parameter.Name: client
Parameter.Abstract: A reference to the RKOAuthClient that triggered the callback

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: An NSError object containing the RKOAuthClientError that triggered the callback

Token.Abstract: Sent when the grant type specified isn't supported by the authentication server

Parameter.Name: client
Parameter.Abstract: A reference to the RKOAuthClient that triggered the callback

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: An NSError object containing the RKOAuthClientError that triggered the callback

Token.Abstract: Sent when the requested scope is invalid, unknown, malformed, or exceeds the scope granted by the resource owner.

Parameter.Name: client
Parameter.Abstract: A reference to the RKOAuthClient that triggered the callback

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: An NSError object containing the RKOAuthClientError that triggered the callback

Token.Abstract: Sent to the delegate when an authorization code flow request failed due to a loading error somewhere within the RKRequest call

Parameter.Name: client
Parameter.Abstract: A reference to the RKOAuthClient that triggered the callback

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: A reference to the RKRequest that failed

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: An NSError object containing the RKOAuthClientError that triggered the callback
